coded_answer.p: I AM WRITINWRITING TO YOU IN ORDER TO GIVE A REPLY TO THE KIND LETTER I RECEIVED FROM YOU. I CANNOT EXPRESS HOW THANFULTHANKFUL I AM FOR THIS BEAUTIFUL PRIZE.
FIRSFIRST OF ALL, I WOULD LIKE TO TELL YOU THAT THE ONLY TIME I WILL BE ABLE TO TRAVEL IS IN JULY, BECAUSE BEFORE THATTHEN I HAVE TO TAKE SOME EXAMS AT THE UNIVERSITY.

IN YOUR LETTER YOU ASKED ME WHETHER I WOULD PREFER, IF A TENT OR A LONGLOG CABIN. WELL, THE ANSWER IS A LONGLOG CABIN, BECAUSE I HAVE A PROBLEM WITH MY BACK. THAT IS WHY I CANNOT SLEEP ON THE GROUND OR IN A SLEEPING BAG.

BY THE WAY, YOU ALSO MENTION THAT I WILL HAVE THE CHANCE TO DO TWO ACTIVITIES. WELL, THE TWO ACTIVITIES THAT I WOULD LIKE TO CHOOSE ARE BASKETBALL AND SINGING. I HAVE CHOOSENCHOSEN THOSE BECAUSE I AM QUITE GOOD AT PLAYING BASKETBALL AND I SING EVERY WEEKEND IN THE CHOIR OF THE LOCAL CHURCH AS WELL.
FINALLY, I WOULD APPRECIATE IT IF YOU LET ME KNOW IF I WILL HAVE TO TAKE SOME CLOTHECLOTHES OR MONEY. I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW IF I WILL HAVE TO PAY FOR ANY OTHER EXTRA ACTIVITYACTIVITIES.
I HOPE YOU WILL BE ABLE TO ANSWER ALL MY QUARIESQUERIES. I LOOK FORWARD TO HEARING FROM YOU.
THANKS FOR THE KIND LETTER YOU SENDSENT ME LASLAST WEEK. THE PHOTOGRAPHS ARE VERY NICE AND FUNNY. BY THE WAY, YOU ARE A BIT TALLER, AREN'T YOU?

WELL, THE FIRST THING I WANT TO TELL YOU IS ABOUT THE POP CONCERT WE HAD, LAST FRIDAY, HERE IN OUR CITY. BUT TO MAKE THE THING BETTER I WAS CHOOSENCHOSEN TO HELP THE BAND AND THE ORGANISERS OF THE CONCERT. GREAT!

AS YOU KNOW, I AM A SOUND TECHNICHTECHNICIAN, SO I HELPHELPED THEM TO PUTSET UP THE SOUND EQUIPMENTSEQUIPMENT AND THE INSTRUMENTS PROPERLY. THEN SOME HOURS BEFORE THE CONCERT, I MET THE BAND AND THEY LET ME STAYEDSTAY INFOR THE SOUND TESTCHECK. IIT WAS A ALREADYREALLY SPECIAL TIME FOR ME! THE MEMBERS OF THE BAND WERE VERY NICE AND FRIENDLY WITHTO ME.

THEN, WHEN THE CONCERT STARTED;, THE ORGANISERS GAVE ME AN IDENTITY CARD, WHICH WAS ONLY FOR MEMBERS OF THE STAFF. THAT CARD WAS THE BEST THING THAT SOMEONE HAD EVER GAVEGIVEN TO ME, BECAUSE I WAS UNABLEABLE TO BE INON THE SCENARYSCENERYSTAGE WITH THE WHOLE BAND! IT WAS THE BEST TIME INOF MY LIFE. I FELT REALLY LUCKY.
SORRY IF MY EXPERIENCE WAS BORING BUT I KNOW YOU WILL ENJOY IT AS MUCH AS I DID.
I LOOK FORWARD TO HEARING FROM YOU. I SENDHAVE SENT YOU SOME PHOTOGRAPHS OF ME WITH THE BAND.
